branchCategory.name: C(D)Q2-Z, Compact Cylinder, Double Acting, Single Rod, Large Bore
branchCategory.description: Large Bore standard double acting, single rod version of the CQ2 compact cylinder. The CQ2 is available in bore sizes from 125mm to 200mm. It comes standard with male or female piston rod threads. It is possible to mount auto switches on any of the 4 surfaces..
